title: ICYMI - A Look Back at the Botham Jean Murder Verdict on the Two-Year Anniversary of His Death
itunes:title: ICYMI - A Look Back at the Botham Jean Murder Verdict on the Two-Year Anniversary of His Death
description:
In this segment from 2018, Trevor discusses the sentencing of ex-cop Amber Guyger for killing Botham Jean in his own home and the verdict's complex emotional aftermath.
